name: Audio Automaton (Justin Forkey)
description:
Hey there! I am Justin Forkey and I was the Technical Lead for this project. This project included a fair number of speed bumps, mainly in the departments of production and art. Although these issues did slow down the overall progress of the game's development, we managed to have functional prototypes for each milestone turn in.

Welcome to your first day with the world famous Audio Automaton. We are now going to start your.....Um...excuse me for a second here....Yes? What is it?....He did what now?!?!?!....Oh great....Sorry about that, but it looks like our tour is going to be cut short as we already have your first assignment. Please hurry now.
